text: Dai, meanwhile, was pedalling furiously on the road. Not a sign of the bus. He passed The Traveller's Joy. At last he caught up Mr. Roberts, walking very dogged towards Llangrwl."Afternoon, Mr.Roberts,"he called, polite, as he shot past. His spirits were rising. He had seen no sign of an accident. Therefore Mr. Roberts must have been mistaken. He would find the bus safe and sound in Llangrwl, and his dear Morfydd quietly having tea in her own home..
